strapiPost.title: Springdale Adopts Update For Downtown Master Plan
strapiPost.content:
Springdale City Council recently accepted the Downtown Springdale Master Plan Update, which will guide the development of Downtown Springdale for the next 5-7 years as it aims to become a vibrant community for businesses and residents.

  • Review and revise: The update brings fresh clarity and establishes new priorities based on the success of the 2015 Downtown Master Plan.
  • Getting focused: The primary focus of the update is housing, parking, art, infrastructure improvements, and the integration of the Luther George Park Expansion and Jones Center Campus Renovation projects into the urban fabric of Downtown Springdale. 

View the complete Master Plan Update HERE.
